alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 10 at 4:16AM PST until December 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TONIGHT TO NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected, except isolated gusts up to 55 mph in the Santa Monica mountains. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Malibu Coast, Santa Monica Mountains, Los Angeles County Beaches, Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles, Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley and Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM tonight to noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Malibu Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains
